metadata.source: German Federal Ministry of Finance (Bundesministerium der Finanzen)
metadata.document: Tax Treatment of Travel Costs for Business Travel Abroad from January 1, 2025

notes.note: Daily allowance (24h) = Full day allowance for trips 24+ hours
Daily allowance (8h) = Partial day allowance for arrival/departure day or trips 8-24 hours
Hotel allowance = Maximum overnight accommodation allowance per night
Meal deductions: Breakfast 20%, Lunch 40%, Dinner 40% of daily allowance
For countries not listed, use Luxembourg rates

country.name: Luxembourg
country.note: Default rates for countries not listed

country.name: Trinidad and Tobago
country.note: Rates also apply to: Antigua and Barbuda, Dominica, Grenada, Guyana, St. Kitts and Nevis, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and Grenadines, Suriname
